channel.title: Barrows Saving
channel.description:
Problem with barrows
I'm using DeltaScape source and am trying to make runescape style barrows. I have set the barrow kills to save into the character file as they should so that players rounds can save.
One problem is that after killing a barrow brother you cannot summon it again how ever if you log out and back in you can summon it once again...
My code to stop that is this
[code] if(objectID == 6821){ if (Ahrimkill > 0) { sM("You have already defeated Ahrim."); } else server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2025, 3557, 9700, heightLevel);[/code]
Is there something I've missed out ?
